name: Utopia: The Creation of a Nation
name_original: Utopia: The Creation of a Nation
description:
Utopia: The Creation of a Nation is a strategy game developed by Gremlin Graphics and Celestial Software. It was originally released in 1991. Jaleco published the game.
Utopia: The Creation of a Nation is available on Atari ST, SNES, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
